ta.title: குபுகோடாரா ஹுலாண்டா ஓயா பாலம் சரிந்தது
body_lines: ඇඹිලිපිටිය තෝරකොලයාය හරහා මිද්දෙණිය ප්‍රධාන මාර්යේ කුබුගොඩආර හුලංදාඔය පාලම ලොරියක් සමග අද පෙරවරුවේ කඩා ඇත.
ඇත විකල්ප මාර්ගයක් ලෙස කදුරැගස්ආර මාර්ගය බාවිතා කල හැකිය. இது 1985 ஆம் ஆண்டில் எபிலிபிட்டியா கிராம ஆடையுடன் இணைந்து கட்டப்பட்டது.

en.title: Kubugodaara Hulanda Oya bridge collapses
body_lines: The Kubugodaara Hulanadda Oya Bridge this morning has been collapsed along the Destroge.
There may be the Kadagasara road as an alternative route. It was built in conjunction with the Ebilipitiya village garment in 1985.

summary_lines: The Kubugodaara Hulanadda Oya Bridge collapsed today near Destroge. Consider Kadagasara road as an alternative. Built in 1985 for Ebilipitiya village garment, it's a significant loss.
